statements: DELETE FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE player_id = 1 AND player_behavior_type = 'negative';
DELETE FROM PlayerBehavior WHERE behavior_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND player_name LIKE '%Alice%';
DELETE FROM player_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'warning' AND behavior_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM player_preferences WHERE email_notifications = TRUE;
DELETE FROM campaign_tracking WHERE game_id = 456 AND player_id = 789;
DELETE FROM campaign_tracking WHERE player_id = 123 AND behavior_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM player_game_preferences WHERE favorite_game = TRUE;
